plugins\/Optimize\/desktop\/php\/Optimiz.Logs enabled: Log writing slows down exe: Logs Enabled: Log writing slows down execution. They must be disabled if they are not used,
plugins\/Optimize\/desktop\/php\/Optimiz.Synchronous mode: Scenarios executed in: Synchronous mode: Scenarios executed in synchronous mode do not wait for a return of commands. Attention, this option can cause malfunctions,
plugins\/Optimize\/desktop\/php\/Optimiz.Disabled: A disabled scenario is stored: Disabled: A disabled scenario is stored in the database. It is best to delete it to speed up queries in the database.
plugins\/Optimize\/desktop\/php\/Optimiz.Bad path: The plugin is not in the right: Bad path: The plugin is not in the right directory,
plugins\/Optimize\/desktop\/php\/Optimiz.Disabled: Information from all plugins a: Disabled: Information from all plugins are read even if they are disabled. Removing a plugin that is not used will also save disk space.
plugins\/Optimize\/desktop\/php\/Optimiz.If you don't use display of your Raspber: If you don't use display of your Raspberry Pi, you can limit the GPU memory to the minimum. This parameter is called gpu_mem and is stored in the file /boot/config.txt. The default value is 64 but you can limit it to 16.
plugins\/Optimize\/desktop\/php\/Optimiz.A backup file of /boot/config.txt was cr: A backup file of /boot/config.txt was created at /boot/config.txt.bak. Its recommanded to reboot your system.
plugins\/Optimize\/desktop\/php\/Optimiz.If you don't use display of your Raspber: If you don't use display of your Raspberry Pi, you can limit the access to the L2 Cache to the CPU.
